Reviews.Title: Phone is great but NOT unlocked!
Reviews.Author: Nari
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product about one month ago and bought another for my wife.  The phones were delivered on time.  The ones I purchased online had no carrier logos but upon arrival I discovered T-mobile branding on them.  So I thought 'ok, no problem - it's supposed to be unlocked,' and went ahead and slipped in my sim card.  What I did not mention as yet is that I live in Trinidad and Tobago (in the Caribbean) and travel a lot, hence the purchase of an unlocked phone.  Upon switching on the phone, I was greeted with a very cool green Android guy.  Unfortunately, I could not get past that screen - because lo and behold, the phone was not unlocked (as advertised)!The only reason I did not automatically return the phones at this point (as advised by the Amazon Rep.) is because it would have been such a hassle to do so.  That's only the first part of the problem.  I then thought that I could just get the phones unlocked by those smart tech people you see in the malls all over the place...  Only to discover that I needed a data plan to even get past the first screen (mind you, this was ALSO NOT advertised).  The end result is that I ended paying about $100 each to get the phones unlocked and activated. I close by saying that the only reason this review did not get only one star is because after  the headache I endured to get them unlocked, the phones are actually great phones.  My wife loves hers and for someone who is not too interested in gadgets - she is absolutely hooked on hers.  My advice is that if you live outside the US, do NOT purchase this phone - it might be okay if you live in the US (but I can't really comment on that).

Reviews.Title: Not Perfect But Will Do
Reviews.Author: LMBADS90
Reviews.Content: I received this phone on time which was great. It came in new condition and the second I insert my SIM card everything went smoothly. I got my G-mail account set up, put in my contacts, installed my Bluetooth - ready to go. This is my first Smartphone so I have low standards at this point for functionality.It's fast except going on the internet, I think it's a little slow on that part; but I am patient. What frustrated me the most was I am unable to download apps like Facebook and Fifth Third because this device is too old. That was a huge bummer! However somewhat relieved there are a few alternatives in the App store for this phone.Other thing is not getting picture messages, but that has been an ongoing problem and doesn't relate to the phone. I will resolve that later, though. Not a huge deal.The Bluetooth is great as I love the hands-fee device. It works fine but the Bluetooth signal truly sucks a lot. If I am 10 feet away or if the phone's in my pocket the other person can't hear me very well and I have to set the phone near my head which practically beats the purpose of a Bluetooth.The battery is very bad! To the point I bought a second one just to last me the whole day. The charging takes hours without using it. I am not a huge texter or caller these days but it doesn't take much for this phone.So you may wonder why 4 stars from all these negative things. Well, it's a 4 because it's very user-friendly I think and easy to use. Setup was very easy and everything works. Got it early and in perfect condition. Had no issues like the other reviewers did. But I do wish we could use today's Apps and it'd be nice to have a better battery, too.So if you are looking for a decent Smartphone to start out with, buy this. Just beware of the battery drainage and lack of Apps.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone for a good Price
Reviews.Author: floridalady
Reviews.Content: This Phone is my first Android and HTC Phone and for beginners this is a great Phone. I'am a T -Mobile Member and after installing the sim card the Phone worked right away.The only low down on this phone is the battery drainage otherwise i love the phone and mostly the size of it.

Reviews.Title: A gift for someone overseas
Reviews.Author: Mehul J. Kamdar
Reviews.Content: We use HTC phones and this is a gift for someone overseas. The price was excellent and the phone arrived in time and in superb condition. I would strongly recommend the seller and would gladly buy from them again. Yes, this is what I say about every seller whom I've bought from through Amazon - I've never had bad service, ever.

Reviews.Title: HTC my Touch #G
Reviews.Author: Pegaso
Reviews.Content: Very good phone, every things was as I spected.The shop helped me all the time with some issue that I has.I'm very happy

Reviews.Title: It was a disappointment!
Reviews.Author: King
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as advertized as an unlocked phone for My Mom in Africa, and she is still struggling to get it unlocked. Please save your money from this phone!

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected, but...
Reviews.Author: Leanna Johnson
Reviews.Content: Screen not very responsive, but has all applications I need. Mistakenly ordered a touch-screen instead of a QWERTY but otherwise okay. It doesn't seem like a bad phone, though I'm used to the 4g Slide, I just have to get used to the 100% touch screen!

Reviews.Title: the least among all androids phones
Reviews.Author: 72sunset
Reviews.Content: This is the worse cell phone ever. two months after I bought this phone it was no use again. The battery life is so poor that you can't even talk for straight 15 minutes.  By the third month, the phone itself starting to go blank, you can't activate your calls, nothing works on it anymore.  I totally do not encourage anyone to buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: do not buy this phone
Reviews.Author: tarerus moore
Reviews.Content: this phone is a piece of s*** ,screen freezes,turn off when ever it wants,battery doesnt stay charge =d ,internet doesn't work ,and i cant make calls or text

Reviews.Title: Romaine Douglas from Jamaica
Reviews.Author: romaine douglas
Reviews.Content: The only thing the phone need to use is a sim on memory card and you ready to go just remember is a 2G phone it not going to go faster with a 4G network ok . If you don't get a manual go online look for one

Reviews.Title: More than I expected for $80 odd bucks!
Reviews.Author: Garfield C. Husbands
Reviews.Content: Everything works on the phone, and it's really flexible in terms of updates and so on. Its fast as wellAll in all a great buy.

Reviews.Title: HTC myTouch 3G Unlocked Android Phone with 3G Support, GPS, Wi-Fi and Touch...
Reviews.Author: Herold Bazile
Reviews.Content: None of them were unlocked. I have to buy a new phone when I got to my vacation destination. None of the phone was Unlocked. I bought 3 of them one for me and the other two was for my Nephews. I was wondering if the vendor can help me unlock them. If the phone was supose to be unlocked why was the phone locked?

Reviews.Title: Do not  trust the Seller
Reviews.Author: Gloria MaysKeys
Reviews.Content: Phome did not last 2months  before it stop working..  Look at the battery part and found that the Red Dot had been cover over with a white dot. .Do not trust the seller...Purchase  phone as New.

Reviews.Title: Bad Battery
Reviews.Author: Edward
Reviews.Content: I went from a  Huawei 4G My Touch to this phone because I cracked the screen.  This phone is ok but it's screen is too small.  The battery life is awful.  I would be driving home from work and the battery would die. It wasn't like I was using it at work or anything.  I've gone back to the Huawei until I can afford another one.

Reviews.Title: Low Quality
Reviews.Author: Loni Bruce
Reviews.Content: Second day I had it I was not able to get the back on the phone clipped on. another friend who had the same one before upgrading said there's did the same thing. They constantly had there battery falling out & powering down the phone because the clips are chinsy. VERY solw to connect with service & internet too in areas where signal is great.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: guadalupe
Reviews.Content: i love it but gets heated fast and turns offthe head set goes off so when you make a call it has to be in speaker modei say they need to recall this phone cuz im on the 2nd and i just dont feel likeexchangein any more

Reviews.Title: She Loves It
Reviews.Author: mboudoir
Reviews.Content: My daughter in-law was in need of a new phone and this one came as decribed and she absolutely Loves It.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: mIKE
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for a brother of mine and he loves it and can activate with most providers as it comes unlocked.

Reviews.Title: Ok for price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: While I can't say this phone is great it does meet my overall needs...except it never fully charges or when charged only last maybe two hours before it is almost dead. And that is after minimal use so if talking or texting the battery runs down even more. I even bought a new battery and nope the phone is worthless as far as holding a charge, but that is my only negative comment about it.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, bad battery
Reviews.Author: Gottaloveemmy
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone mid-February 2013. I paid for Saturday shipping and it arrived on schedule.  I was surprised at how small the phone is, but it came in new condition (i don't yet know if it's unlocked although it SAYS it is.) I will agree with several people about the bad battery life. It takes about 6-7 hours to charge the phone and about 1 hour (or less) to drain. Good thing is I called the company who shipped the phone and the CSR offered to send me 2 new batteries. I should have been suspicious because both of the new ones are bad also. But on the flip side, at least I have 3 batteries. Everything works well, except youtube which doesn't always play the VIDEO but does play the audio. Overall the phone is nice, but the battery life sucks. This would be a good starter smart phone but not for a serious "APPer"

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: tne2013
Reviews.Content: The sender got this phone to me in a nice amount of time but the phone does not have an updated system at all. Even the marketplace is out dated. The phone was not worth it.

Reviews.Title: phone is decent, but some bugs
Reviews.Author: Hassan Ali
Reviews.Content: the only thing i hate about this phone is the short battery life and the fact that the phone constantly restarts itself out of nowhere at the most inappropriate times.

Reviews.Title: Do the research on a product before buying it
Reviews.Author: benicia stakes
Reviews.Content: I am not totally satisfied with my product right now because I believe I need the manuel to help explain its use.  My previous cell phone was a basic one with easy to use functions.  I am having difficulty finding how to use those basic functions in the HTC my Touch 3G Unlocked  Android Phone.  On the other hand I do like the touch screen, the swype texting, and phone size.

Reviews.Title: unsatisfactory
Reviews.Author: irvanjl71
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived quickly but was unable to ever get the phone to work. I have T-mobile service and unlimited data. Phone still would not work. I had to send it back in.

Reviews.Title: HTC My Touch 3G Unlocked Android Phone
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I love this phone that I ordered. Works perfectly with my life style. Easy to set up and navigate through.

Reviews.Title: HTC my Touch 3G Phone
Reviews.Author: Eva L. Mannaberg "Eva Mannaberg"
Reviews.Content: Sorry, but the phone was faulty and had to be returned. I also found tha the keyboard was much too small.

Reviews.Title: No thanks.
Reviews.Author: britt
Reviews.Content: The interface is easy to use and is very similar to the G1- Google phone. I was pleased with this because it is an easy transition.However, the reason that I hate this phone is because I don't get all of my text messages. People will send text messages and picture  messages, and you can flip a coin to determine if I ever get it. VERY ANNOYING.The battery life isn't great, I don't leave home without the charger and I just text during the day and check facebook a couple of times.I could barely hear someone I was on a call with and was disappointed to discover that the volume was up all the way.This is my first touch screen phone and it is not a very responsive touch screen keyboard. This can be very frustrating when trying to type up a message.Overall, the most annoying thing is the fact that I don't get all of my text messages, it drives me crazy.I would not purchase this item again.

Reviews.Title: looks like new
Reviews.Author: mcook
Reviews.Content: only touch phone that I have been able to use without a problem. I am a senior and have problems with the new phones. I just do not understand them that well. I was very happy with my slider without a touch screen. Thought I would try one after being told enough about getting a touch screen. Actually I enjoy this phone. Great seller would buy from again.

Reviews.Title: Cheap replacement Phone
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: Received package within the time frame expected. I wouldn't say it was brand new but a refurbish phone due to the scratches on it  where it charges, four stars for that. Decent condition otherwise, works great. My son's phone got stolen, so the phone was meant as a cheap replacement phone  till its time to upgrade for free.

Reviews.Title: fun easy to use but has its problems
Reviews.Author: amber
Reviews.Content: I have had two of these in the past year, the first was loaned to me it worked great and as my first smart phone was easy to set up but despite having the picture messaging function it only would receive pictures not send (the message always failed) also the track ball went bad pretty early but I still liked it and thought that a new one probably wouldn't have these problems. my new one has the same picture messaging problem plus all the buttons on the right hand side only work if pushed directly in the center and held for a few seconds ( making powering on and off a pain and hanging up impossible ) there is an alternative to hanging up by using the menu button but its a pain also the battery needs recharging every night even if I don't use my phone. but I love this phone despite its issues, it holds up extremely well to wear and tear, won't beak if dropped unlike a lot of newer smart phones and the apps are great.

Reviews.Title: nice fone
Reviews.Author: ha
Reviews.Content: i brought this phone for my assistant and she likes it and the phone come very quick. the phone looks new and the shipping package was very good as well. it is good to fine ppl that are selling good staff on amazon.thank you

Reviews.Title: I Paid For New Not Used
Reviews.Author: chalant
Reviews.Content: i ordered a unlocked 3g mytouch and recieved it 4 days later. first i was not pleased with the fact i hadnt recieved a headset. the charger was scratched up but i over looked that. now after further inspection i saw a small crack on the top. i paid 104 plus tax for a NEW phone so i decided to send it back and get my money. this was the first time i ordered a phone online and i was dissapointed. i guess they think they can sell a item with flaws expecting the customer to not notice, thats not good business!

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: love
Reviews.Content: I am not happy with the phone it don't right and it keep turning its self off .I didn't receive a receipt in the box

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE SUCKS
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I RECENTLY BOUGHT THIS PHONE AND THE TOUCH SCREEN DOESN'T EVEN WORK. I HAVE TO USE THE BALL TO USE THE PHONE!!!! REFUND!

Reviews.Title: negative
Reviews.Author: Chovanique Kibble
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my son and immediately he was complaining about how it functioned. I didn't realize this phone was so little in person and i believe its refurbished.

Reviews.Title: really dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Mara H. Montano "Jesuslove"
Reviews.Content: I lost my phone, and was looking everywere for a touch phone but not wanting to waste $300 on a phone. so I came across this phone and was really hoping it would work, after reading some of the reviews I thought i would take a chance.. well now i totally regret it. this phone is JUNK! as soon as i charged it, the phone wouldnt even work. i have been without a phone going on 2 weeks now. and i work and so does my husband so when school or daycare calls i make sure i pick up (what a drag) now i have to return the phone to get a refund to look for another phone and pray i wont go through the same thing.. save yourself some time and money.. dont purchase this phone it really sucks.. i even took it to t-mobile and they suggested to return it, i looked around the store they dont even have this out. they stop selling these!!! well now it looks like another week without a phone

Reviews.Title: Richard
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: HTC my Touch 3G Unlock Android 3GThe phone work very well. The only camera do not function, Amazon refund very well, they stand behind their product.Thank you amazon.

Reviews.Title: kk
Reviews.Author: kk
Reviews.Content: hey frnds i recommend this cell phone..nice HTC product...but when u buy than search on other site also some time distributor price is more than other distributor...

Internal memory: Flash 512MB; RAM 192 MB DDR
Phone book entries: Up to 10, 000
Email: Gmail client for Gmail only; separate e-mail software app for accessing IMAP, POP3, Exchange mail
Digital audio player compatibility: MP3, AAC, AAC+, WMA, WAV, AMR, OGG
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
